channel.title: Forums on PSP
channel.description: Right now, i'm doing this topic on my PSP. There only about 4 flaws atm. 1. You can't download anything to your Memory Stick. 2. You can view pictures but cannot view Flash. 3. You cannot watch video's atm. 4. Kind of long to type unless you're a fast typer or you have those mini keyboards plugged in. Discuss what you have on your PSP! :|

item.title: Forums on PSP
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I have browsed these forums on a PSP and I could save stuff to a memory sticks, view flash animations and videos. (Not Youtube though)

Only problem I had was if you use the Quote feature on smf the Javascript did not work correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Forums on PSP
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

Right now, i’m doing this topic on my PSP. There only about 4 flaws atm. 1. You can’t download anything to your Memory Stick. 2. You can view pictures but cannot view Flash. 3. You cannot watch video’s atm. 4. Kind of long to type unless you’re a fast typer or you have those mini keyboards plugged in. Discuss what you have on your PSP!

Read full topic
